body_html: NCCL should work with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING, but only starting with CUDA 9 (the report mentions CUDA 8), since we can then launch kernels on multiple GPUs in a single cuda operation using cudaLaunchCooperativeKernelMultiDevice.
